import React from 'react'; import './../styles/login.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import loginImg from './../assets/images/login.png' import userIcon from './../assets/images/user.png' const Login = () => { const [credentials,setCredentials]=useStat({ userId:'01', userEmail:'example@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; return

Login

Don't have an account? Create
}; export default Login;
